msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; incipits and headings of the texts; numbers and titles of the chapters written in the margins; numbers of the “tituli”; elements of the punctuation signs and numerals; on the incipit page of each Gospel, a few lines are rubricated (in groups of two lines, alternating with black lines); crux ansata.

msItem.note: During the restoration carried out on 19.11.2011, fol. 13 was returned on its original place, between fols. numbered 19 and 20; and fol. 11 to its original place between fols. 2 and 3.

list.item:
Fol. 2v: Record concerning the arrival of monk Zäbanä Krǝstos at Däbrä Maʿṣo Yoḥannǝs.Fol. 2v: በእንተ፡ ፍቅሩ፡ ለዮሐንስ፡ መጻእኩ፡ አነ፡ ዘባነ፡ ክርስ፡ ቶስ፡ መነኮስ፡ ሐነ፡ <...>፡ ለቤ፡ ተክርስቲያን፡ ኢትርስዑኒ፡ አቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት።
Written by Zäbanä Krǝstos, a 17th-century monk and scribe, lived during the time of Egyptian Patriarch Matthew and Ethiopian Metropolitan Krǝstodulo (II) (in tenure 1664-71, d. 1675/76, s. EAE IV, 441b).

Fol. 3ra: Note mentioning King Zärʾa Yaʿqob, by scribe Yoḥannǝs.
The note is the end of Additio 8. The beginning and the main body of the note is on another leaf, which was misplaced (after the conservation work, it returned on its place and is now fol. 3a).

Fol. 3rb: Note on commemoration days of some individuals.Fol. 3rb: በእንተ፡ ዘከሮሙ፡ ለአበውየ፡ በሐለ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ዘሚካኤል፡ ለሀብተ፡ ሚካኤል። ተዝካሩ፡ አመ፲ወሰኑይ፡ ለሀምሌ። ወተክለ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወል፡ ዱ፡ ወተስፋ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ከማሆሙ፡ ኢተርስ፡ እዎሙ። ወሐብተ፡ ኢየሱስኒ፡ ተዘከሩ፡ አመ፡ ሀሙሱ፡ ለሐምሌ።
Written in the hand of Zäbanä Krǝstos.

Fols. 7v-8v, 9rb: Prayer Fǝtḥat zä-wäld "Absolution of the Son".Fols. 7v-8v, 9rb: ፍትሐት፡ ዘወልድ፡ እግዚእ፡ እግኦ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ወልድ፡ ዋሕድ፡ ቃለ፡ እግዚአብሔርአብ፡ ...
Written in the hand of Zäbanä Krǝstos in the bottom margins, mentioning Egyptian Patriarch Matthew and Ethiopian Metropolitan Krǝstodulo (II; 1664-71, d. 1675/76, s. EAE IV, 441b).

Fol. 10rb: Historiographic note.Fol. 10rb: በ፷፻፯፲ወ፮፡ አመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ በ፫፻ወ፮፡ አመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ መጽአ፡ ርሀብ፡ ለዕለ፡ ኵሉ፡ ም[ድ]ር
Written in the hand of Zäbanä Krǝstos (s. Nosnitsin 2011). The note mentiones two dates. One is 6716 year of mercy, which is difficult to interpret (it might be meant "from the creation of the world", to correspond to 1224 A.D.). Another one is 316 year of mercy which corresponds to 1664 A.D. (cp. Additio 6 in Ms. UM-027).

Fol. 10va: Note on commemoration days of ʾƎndalu and his relatives.10va: በአኰቴታ፡ አብወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ አነሀብተመርያም፡ ሐጥእ፡ ጸኀፍኩ፡ ለአቡይ። እንዳሉ፡ {ወለብእሲቱ፡ ዜነ፡ መርየም፡ ተዝከሮሙ፡ ምስለ፡ ብእሲሀ፡ በአኀዱ፡ ዕለት} ተዝከረ፡ ዕረፍቱ፡ እም፳ወ፬ ለመስከረም፡ ወለዘ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወልዱሂ፡ ፲ወ፪፡ ለሕዳር። ዕረፍቱ። ወለሰመረ፡ ክርስቶስሂ፡ ፳ወ፩። ለጥቅምት፡ ዕረፍቱሂ፡ ወቀተልዎ፡ እርብ፡ አረዕ፡ ወበጸሎቶሙ፡ ይምሐረኒ። ለኀጥእ፡ ሀብተመርያም፡ ለዐለም፡ ዐለም፡ አሜን።
Written by Habtä Maryam (the hand is earlier than the hand of Zäbanä Krǝstos).

Fol. 10va-vb: Prayer, unidentified, possibly a later continuation of Additio 6.Fol. 10va-vb: ወዕቀቤሙ፡ በሃይ{ማ}ኖት፡ ርትዕት፡ ወያዕርጉ፡ ለከ፡ ስብሀት፡ ወከብር፡ በኵሉ፡ መዋዕለ፡ ሕይወ፡ ቶሙ፡ ...
Written in the hand of Zäbanä Krǝstos.

Fol. 11r-v: Note commemorating Patriarch ʾAstona "zä-hagärä Rome", who resided and died on Däbrä Maʿṣo.
Written by the scribe Yoḥannǝs (s. Additio 2), in the time of King Zärʾa Yaʿqob, on the order of Zä-ʾAmanuʾel.

Fol. 50rb: Bäʾǝntä ṣǝnʿa zatti mäkan... "For the strengthening of this place..." (Litanic prayer).Fol. 50rb: ወይብል፡ ካህን፡ ዘንተ፡ ስእለታት። በሳሙነ፡ ሕማማት። በኵሉ፡ ሰዐታት፡ ወያወሥኡ፡ ሕዝብ፡ ወይብሉ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ተሠሃለነ። ጸልዩ። በእንተ፡ ዛቲ፡ ጽንዐ፡ መካን፡...
Written in the hand of the scribe Yoḥannǝs (s. above).

Fols. 74rb-75vb: Land charters of Däbrä Maʿṣo.
Written in the hand of scribe Wäldä Muse (19th cent.).

Fol. 113v: Recent record concerning land possessions.Fol. 113v: የርስት፡ ነገር፡ ሕንፃትን፡ ዘወልድን፡ አህዋት፡ ሕንፃት፡ ወልደ፡ ሚካዔል፡ ወልደ፡ ወልደሚካዔል፡...
Written in Tǝgrǝñña.
- The name of Zäbanä Krǝstos has been written interlineally, fol. 144vb.

origin.origDate: From the time of King Dawit II (r. 1382-1412). The name of King Zärʾa Yaʿqob (r. 1344-68) is mentioned in Additio 2 (fol. 3ra).
